Package json

package json
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    JSONArray
    Represents a mutable JSON Array.
    JSONBoolean
    Represents an immutable JSON boolean value.

    Only two instances of this class ever exist.
    JSONFactory
    Factory for creating JSON Values.

    Since some values are immutable, common shared instances are used when possible.
    JSONNull
    Represents an immutable JSON null value.

    Only one instance of this class ever exists.
    JSONNumber
    Represents an immutable JSON number value.

    The actual type of the stored value is determined by which version of the constructor is called.

    Rather than store everything as double, the appropriate type is used, to save space and to also ensure the value is displayed correctly when output as a string, i.e.
    JSONObject
    Represents a mutable JSON object.
    JSONParser
    A JSON parser

    This is part of the very simple custom JSON package that provides minimal model building and output functionality.

    This could be replaced with javax.json.Json if more complex JSON processing is ever required.

    JSONString
    Represents an immutable JSON string value.
    JSONValue
    Base class for JSON values.

  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    JSONException
    Thrown to indicate JSON Parse or number conversion issues.
